name: Dophigo
0:
”Alexa, show me front door”
”Alexa, show bedroom camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Dophigo video doorbell and cameras are designed to securely monitor your home or business from the Dophigo app on your smartphone. 
To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button to link your Dophigo account and discover your Dophigo video doorbell and camera.

To view your video feed, you can say:
"Alexa, show me frontdoor"
"Alexa, show me front door camera"

To close your video feed, you can say:
"Alexa, turn off frontdoor"
"Alexa, turn off front door camera"
